comments.comments_text: Angel Correa (Atl. Madrid) finishes his beautiful individual effort with a superb strike from inside the box. Leandro Chichizola is just a bystander as the ball flies into bottom right corner. The score is 0:1.

comments.comments_text: A great individual effort by Yannick Carrasco (Atl. Madrid)! Showcasing his skills, he weaves his way through the defence and produces a low shot from inside the box which goes into the bottom right corner. A quite a remarkable goal!

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Jonathan Calleri (UD Las Palmas) makes it 1:2. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Figueroa Cabrera Momo and planted his close-range header into the middle of the goal. Jan Oblak was helpless.

comments.comments_text: Koke (Atl. Madrid) quickly gets to a rebound. He is not worried how far out he is and slams the ball towards the goal. To the amazement of all, it goes inside the right post. He makes it 1:3 with this magnificent strike.

comments.comments_text: Brilliant finish! Thomas (Atl. Madrid) perfectly collected a pass on the edge of the penalty area from Yannick Carrasco, then produced a nice strike into the top left corner. The score is 1:5.
